decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1507 - TP - 02 Rev K, 1507 - TP - 03 Rev D, 1507 - TP - 04 Rev F and Advertising brochure for the units received on 16/03/2015, Site location Plan and planning statement received on 23/03/2015 and letter received on 08/05/2015 and letter received on 18/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for a mobility and care product showroom (Sui Generis use) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class Sui Generis of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - Details of the proposed disabled parking space to the front of Unit 3 shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the spaces shown on the approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development.
description: Change of use from light industrial use (B1c), General Industrial (B2) and storage and distribution (B8) to mobility and care product showroom (sui generis)
